html: This legislation mirrors Oregon’s framework and will also ensure tipped workers are paid the same as non-tipped workers. It has been ten years since Congress raised the federal minimum wage and the time is now.
text: This legislation mirrors Oregon’s framework and will also ensure tipped workers are paid the same as non-tipped workers. It has been ten years since Congress raised the federal minimum wage and the time is now.

html: A $7.25 federal minimum wage is indefensible in this day and age. This week, I co-sponsored legislation introduced by Congresswoman Terri A. Sewell to raise the federal minimum wage to $15/hour in our nation’s cities and take a regional approach in less urban areas.
text: A $7.25 federal minimum wage is indefensible in this day and age. This week, I co-sponsored legislation introduced by Congresswoman Terri A. Sewell to raise the federal minimum wage to $15/hour in our nation’s cities and take a regional approach in less urban areas.

html: POTUS has gone too far. Our founders gave the Legislative Branch, not POTUS, the express power to decide how to spend taxpayer $$. The POTUS’s job is to execute the will of Congress & his action today is an infringement on the power delegated under Article 1 of the Constitution.
text: POTUS has gone too far. Our founders gave the Legislative Branch, not POTUS, the express power to decide how to spend taxpayer $$. The POTUS’s job is to execute the will of Congress & his action today is an infringement on the power delegated under Article 1 of the Constitution.

html: I've visited the US-Mexico border & there is no national emergency. Families & children seeking asylum from brutality in their home countries hold no threat. Yesterday, Congress passed an overwhelmingly bipartisan agreement on how to fund security along our southern border.
text: I've visited the US-Mexico border & there is no national emergency. Families & children seeking asylum from brutality in their home countries hold no threat. Yesterday, Congress passed an overwhelmingly bipartisan agreement on how to fund security along our southern border.

html: As a result of the testimony and outreach by the students of MSD High School in Parkland and students in my own district, I am cosponsoring HR 8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act to require universal background checks on all firearm sales, like we have in Oregon.
text: As a result of the testimony and outreach by the students of MSD High School in Parkland and students in my own district, I am cosponsoring HR 8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act to require universal background checks on all firearm sales, like we have in Oregon.
